EmailTemplate.name: CASL consent
EmailTemplate.subject: Canada's Anti-Spam Law Takes Effect July 1st
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IT'S YOUR CHOICE CANADA'S ANTI-SPAM LAW TAKES EFFECT JULY 1ST
Canada's Anti-Spam Legislation (CASL) comes into effect on July 1, 2014 and is intended to better protect Canadians from unwanted and potentially damaging electronic messages. It requires you to opt in to stay connected with PGi.
Email communications sent by PGi include:
tips and techniques for improving work productivity updates concerning the latest work trends, and announcements related to our products and services.
These communications are free of charge and as always, you can unsubscribe at any time.
Ensure you continue to be part of our ongoing conversation about collaboration and see why we have hosted more than 250 million virtual meetings.
OPT IN NOW TO STAY CONNECTED TO PGI
Should you have any questions about CASL, or this email, please do not hesitate to contact me. For further information on CASL, please visit the Government of Canada website.
Â© Premiere Global Services, Inc. and/or its affiliates | PGi Canadian Head Office: 225 King Street West, suite 900, Toronto, ON M5V 3M2
If you wish to unsubscribe from these types of PGi communications, simply unsubscribe.
